rooms.description: Serves as the welcoming space with proper Vastu alignment; placed on the auspicious north-eastern direction.
Spacious living area located in the center to promote energy flow and social interactions. Incorporates Vastu by having windows on the east for morning light.
Adjacent to the living room, ensuring ease of access with a north-eastern window placement per Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with open ventilation; designed on the south-west side for efficient cooking and waste disposal while following Vastu norms.
Principal bedroom located in the northeast quadrant to harness positive energy, with ample natural light from east-facing windows.
Adjacent guest room ensuring privacy and comfort; designed with south-west orientation for relaxation.
Small living space for the domestic staff, situated on the west side to minimize interference with main family areas, adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Functional workspace integrated into a quiet corner of the ground floor for work or study; located in the west, ensuring minimal disturbance to living areas.

openings.description: The primary entry point that aligns with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Safety exit in compliance with local building norms and emergency evacuation requirements.
Secondary entrance for utilities and maintenance staff, ensuring clear segregation from main living areas.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for guests or children, strategically placed on the east to enhance relaxation and calm.
Well-lit bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort; positioned in the north-west quadrant following Vastu for balanced energy.
Private bathroom attached to Bedroom 3 with proper drainage and privacy considerations.
Private bathroom serving Bedroom 4 with adequate ventilation and light.

Entertainment space designed for optimal acoustics; placed in the south-east corner to minimize disruption of main living areas. Equipped with soundproofing and adjustable lighting per Vastu recommendations.
Modern fitness area tailored for personal use; located on the north-western side to encourage energy flow and ensure privacy. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with natural light.
Multifunctional room for occasional exercise or study, placed in a quiet corner to promote focus and calm energy.

openings.description: Essential vertical circulation element connecting both floors, designed with ample space and safety features.
Provides natural light and ventilation to the upper level rooms while maintaining privacy.

vastu_note: The plan is designed keeping Vastu principles in mind by aligning primary living spaces towards the north-eastern direction, ensuring proper energy flow. All room placements consider local building norms as well.

local_norms.construction_standards: Compliant with local Indian building codes and safety regulations.
